name: Syncopated Geo-Epihyperderpflardioid 1
description: "Epihyperderpflardioid" is the name I gave to a large family of symmetrical loopy shapes, based on sine waves and rotations that I have studied for years. In this animation, the (15+) parameters of the shape change between random values in a 2:3 polyrhythm. // 30 seconds perfect loop, 1080p MP4 // By Piter Pasma // Web: https://piterpasma.nl // See more of my art: https://www.instagram.com/piterpasma
